As France's prestige reaches unprecedented heights, it serves as a catalyst for the remarkable growth of its population. The allure of France's cultural magnificence, its illustrious history, and its unparalleled contributions to the realms of art, literature, and philosophy have captivated the hearts and minds of people from far and wide. The reputation of France as a center of refinement and sophistication has drawn countless individuals seeking to be part of its vibrant tapestry. The population surges as ambitious dreamers, talented artisans, and aspiring intellectuals flock to the nation, driven by the promise of a brighter future and the opportunity to bask in the radiance of France's prestige. The cosmopolitan cities of Paris, Bordeaux, and Lyon become bustling hubs of activity, buzzing with the energy of a diverse populace united by their shared desire to be part of the grand French narrative. As the population expands, so too does the nation's potential, with each new inhabitant adding to the rich mosaic of ideas, creativity, and innovation that propels France forward. This virtuous cycle of prestige and population growth intertwines, solidifying France's position as a global powerhouse, where the allure of its prestige continues to shape the destiny of a nation destined for greatness.
§YManage Money Grants and Military Supplies Aid
Triggers an event that lets you enable giving grants, deny giving grants, or request money and military goods from other human players.
We have recently requested a grant and must wait awhile before asking for another one.

In order to give player grants or military supplies, select the enable giving aid option. If you wish to automatically deny grants and military supplies, select the deny giving aid option. If you are asking for a money grant or military supplies, select the type of aid you wish to receive. Note that if you wish to give military supplies to another player, you must manually set your stockpile.
We do not have the required stockpile of supplies that we wish to send.

The island of Taiwan has always maintained some level of independence from the mainland, and even without official Qing assistance, this island has prospered well.

The channels of power require an eye for detail, a fine touch, and a silver tongue. Let our people focus our energies into refining these qualities so we may be masters over those who are less.. refined.

The Khedive of Egypt, Isma'il I commissioned an expedition to explore the Equatoria region south of the Sudan, and to organize a new Egyptian province there. A British explorer and engineer named Samuel White Baker who had led an expedition down the Nile in 1865 was contracted by the Khedive to lead the Egyptian forces and to be the first Governor-General of the new territory..
An expansionist Khedive, Isma'il I moved to incorporate the territory of Darfur into the Egyptian Sudan in 1874.
Non-Accepted Bureaucrats Decision Cooldown is 10 years.
Our regional rivals are promoting pan-Italian nationalism in an attempt to legitimize the conquest of their neighbors! We must form a counter bloc to stop their clearly expansionist policy.
The Italian peninsula has been united! No longer will pretender elements exist within Italy.
We have crushed our pathetic rival's attempt at unifying the Italian peninsula under their guise of nationalism. Now we must unite the Italian peninsula under OUR guise of nationalism!

The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper, but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia, and Austria.

The Adriatic Sea, a region that is historically Italian, is within our grasp and many Italians live in the lands around it to this day. It's time to assert our hegemony on the territory around it, safeguarding the Italians that still live there.
If Australia is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If South Africa is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
If Canada is AI for the first year of the game, you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.
This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores into artisans.
China and Japan specific decision that protects you until 1865 from acquire land CBs, but also blocks you from building them.USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.
China and Japan specific decision that turns off your protection from acquire land CBs, that you otherwise would have until 1865. USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.

This decision is intended to salvage your country after it has been craftsmen hijacked. It will revert all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores to artisans so that your core craftsmen will start working. (Think South Germans in Venetia hijacking.) BECAREFUL OF USE.
§YRemove Minorities from Administrative Positions (10 Year Cooldown)

Our government is in need of restructuring due to seperatists corrupting our ranks, especially in states and colonies where our language is hardly spoken. Something must be done to filter out the dissenting elements within the administration left in these areas to make way for a more loyal bureaucracy.\n\n§GAll Non-Accepted Bureaucrats will be converted into Artisans
Ask The French Empire for Support
There is such beauty and strength in Paris that could help us craft our destiny in the East. Perhaps, we could create something out of this admiration. (Decision only available in 1836)
Ask The British Empire for Support
The world's oceans are big enough for the two of us, surely the British Empire will understand then that we require her resources to prosper in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836)
Ask the United States for Support

Clearly we cannot trust other interests in Asia, but we can't fuel this machine on good will. There appears to be a budding nation across the Pacific... they may be able to provide us with markets in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836)
If our interests are in China, then surely allying ourselves with the next best thing to overcome her would be the right course of action. (Decision only available in 1836)

The time to unite the Andean peoples is upon us! We must create a vanguard nation state to call all Andeans home. Long live Peru-Bolivia!
This decision removes AI nations from immigration priority entirely. Immigrants will only go to player nations.
During this time period, there were land reforms in Mexico very similar to the United States Homestead Act.

The Major Powers chaffing at our periphery is inclining us to attempt projecting into the steppe, but who could possibly own such a vast region with land ownership? The real value is the people themselves.
For too long have the peoples of the Balkans thwarted our efforts of expansion. Let us focus all our attention to the re-education and assimilation of these barbaric peoples.
